column6: N-ZONE PART 1 The Fantastic Four must travel to the N-Zone to discover the secret of their phase-state transformations. If they can find what they're looking for, Reed might be able reverse the transformation process!
column8: | inker:John Dell | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Warren Ellis | penciller (cover):Adam Kubert | penciller (cover):Andy Kubert | colorist:Dave Stewart
